descriptionHtml:
[img]http://img.photobucket.com/albums/v611/nedius/TamrielIngredients.png[/img]

[i][font=Verdana][size=3][b]**** - THIS MOD HAS BEEN TAKEN OVER BY TELVANNIFROSTMANE WITH KIND PERMISSION FROM NEDIUS. AN UPDATE IS UNDER DEVELOPMENT, POST IDEAS AND REQUESTS IF YOU HAVE ANY. - ****[/b][/size][/font]

Skyrim is not a land alone, but part of a much greater continent. From all across Tamriel, traders bring their wares; happily exchanged for coin. Not all bring weapons or treasures, many bring simple items – foodstuffs and other harvested goods. For those who practice alchemy, there may be rare treasures to be found amongst the simplest of herbs.[/i]


[b]The Ingredients of Tamriel Project[/b]

[b]Contents[/b]
1. Features
2. Installation
3. Credits
4. Still needed & Getting Involved
5. Change log

[b]1. Features[/b]
In the Ingredients of Tamriel Project, you will find 217 lore-friendly alchemical ingredients, and 8 new alchemical properties. The ingredients have been created to represent those found in the games Daggerfall, Morrowind (Inc Bloodmoon & Tribunal), The Elder Scrolls Travels series and Oblivion (inc Oblivion Mobile). Also included are some ingredients mentioned in Redguard.
Most ingredients come with new textures. At the moment, there are no new meshes. The textures have been gathered from open source images, many of them photos of real life equivalents; the ginkgo leaves texture have real ginkgo leaf photos, the chokeweed was made from photos of ‘eastern hemlock’.

New meshes have now been added! Thanks go to ChickenDownUnder!

[b]2. Installation[/b]
Simply extract the .zip file into your Skyrim data folder, or use the download manager.


[b]3. Credits[/b]
Textures and ingredients by Nedius, with the following exceptions:
ChickenDownUnder - Ashyams, Bamboo, Hackle-lo, Marshmerrow, Stoneflower Petals and Trama Root (models and textures)
Information gathered from http://www.uesp.net/wiki/Main_Page
Thanks to the Elder Scrolls community for the help and support.
AxelRocks - The main title scroll image (originally edited by Nedius)

[b]4. STILL NEEDED:[/b]

Here is where YOU can be involved in the Ingredients of Tamriel Project!

I still need several ingredients from previous games for which there are no obvious meshes in game to retexture. If you can make one, I’d love to add it to the project!
See a texture in the mod you don’t like? Could you do a better job? Then please do so! Make a new/better version, send it to me, and I’ll add it to the mod and give you all the credit!

So, I offer an open invite for anyone to contribute to this project! Even a single new/improved texture will make this a better mod / resource!

[b]Ingredients needed:[/b]
Daggerfall
• Ghoul’s tongue
• Gorgon Snake
Morrowind:
• Coda flower
• Cork[i]b[/i]ulb Root
Tribunal
• Lloramor spines
• Scrib Cabbage
Bloodmoon
• Bristleback Leather
Oblivion
• Aloe Vera leaves
• Unicorn Horn

[b]Alchemical Effects Needed:[/b]
• Water Walking
• Detect Life


[b]5. Change Log[/b]

1.10
• Added new meshes from ChickenDownUnder (Ashyams, Bamboo, Hackle-lo, Marshmerrow, Stoneflower Petals and Trama Root)
author: Nedius
